layout.title: Portfolio Francisco José Rodríguez Martínez - Vaoredrys se Web Uēttrenka

hero.heroDescription1: Software se Tolikos Stack Web Vaoredrys.

projectsPage.allProjectsTitle: Dāeremagon - Portfolio Francisco José Rodríguez Martínez - Vaoredrys se Web Uēttrenka
projectsPage.allProjectsDescription: Tolvio dāeremagon - Portfolio Francisco José Rodríguez Martínez - Vaoredrys se Web Uēttrenka

projects.title: Agrooe Cashback
projects.description: Konir web lo jiōragon lenton naejot vaoresagon hen ōdaptan kessa platform zūgagon naejot pāsagon hen sȳz products se va gaoman hen local jāhor. Jiōragon hen ōdaptan lenton konir concept naejot va praktika skaeragon tolī va back-end tolī va front-end. Tolvie teknologiā uēttrenka sagon pōja integrācijas tolī jwt naejot va kontrol hen mittys hen īlon se glaeson sagon, kessa dashboard naejot va kontrol hen tolvio dāta... Toliot tolī urnējagon sagon lēkia tolī mirrī social, skaeragon hen mittys tolī īlon naejot bē products daor tolī negon naejot ziry, maps hen va tēpta jiōrre skoriot īlon could kostagon va product lo kesrio, keskydoso mirre ziry. Hae motivos hen pryvacy daor urnējagon va code.

projects.title: Strapi Games Store
projects.description: Web app skaeragon naejot gaomar games līr drējī Strapi tolī backend se CMS.

projects.title: Realtime Chat
projects.description: Chat app drējī Socket.IO naejot real-time mīsagon se Supabase tolī database.

projects.title: Super Mario Bros 85'
projects.description: Iōrilētso naejot educational uēpo hen va legendary Nintendo tymptos Super Mario Bros hen 1985.

projects.title: Paint Windows 95'
projects.description: Kessa Paint-gaomas application hen va Windows 95 uēpa.

projects.title: Bookshop View Transitions Demo
projects.description: Web udrirzi naejot pryjagon view transitions.

projects.title: Tiktok iōrilētso
projects.description: Tiktok māzīs iōrilētso drējī Vite se React lenton Supabase backend.

projects.title: Atari Breakout Tymptos
projects.description: Legendary Atari BreakOut tymptos mōrī lenton JavaScript.

projects.title: Filmax
projects.description: Web naejot urnējagon information nūmāzma movies se series.

projects.title: Web Calculator
projects.description: Hēnka calculator naejot gaomagon mihot arithmētikos operations.

projects.title: Pokēdex
projects.description: Pokēdex naejot urnējagon information nūmāzma pokēmons lenton va possibility naejot tepagon raqiros, dōrī daor hae skaeragon aōha tubis pokēmon.

projects.title: Ēlī portfolio
projects.description: Ēlī web portfolio drējī sylutan HTML, CSS se JavaScript. Tolvȳn lo lo implements lo Astro.

certificationsPage.certificationsTitle: Kīsir - Portfolio Francisco José Rodríguez Martínez - Vaoredrys se Tolikos Stack
certificationsPage.certificationsDescription: Kīsir - Portfolio Francisco José Rodríguez Martínez - Vaoredrys se Tolikos Stack

certificationsList.title: Kīsir hen Vaoredrys Web Tolikos Stack
certificationsList.description: Rhēdan lo vaoredrys web Tolikos Stack, keskydoso skaeragon hen māzīgon lenton HTML, CSS se React, vaoredrys backend lenton Node.js, MongoDB, gaomar hen database se deploy lenton DevOps līriar keskydoso mirre zaldrīzo teknologiār.

certificationsList.title: Kīsir hen Gaomilaksir hen entornos lo Linux
certificationsList.description: Ōdrikagon naejot gaomilaksir entornos Linux lo Debian, Kali se mirre systems ziry lo Linux keskydoso configuration hen software, system mittys se optimización hen rhaedar se ōdrikty.

experience.title: Vaoredrys hen Software se Front-End lo Dimap®
Vaoredrys hen Software lo Gubb Marketing®
experience.description: Vaoredrys hen Software se applications web.

experience.title: Vaoredrys hen Agrooe-Cashback naejot Agrooe® se Gubb Marketing®
experience.description: Vaoredrys hen 0 hen kessa application web gaomar lo va administration hen kessa system hen cashback naejot va negon Agrooe®. Vaoredrys hen va database, va backend se va frontend hen va application web.

experience.title: Freelancer
experience.description: Vaoredrys hen dāeremagon personal se professional hen mirrī type.
